name: Horde Mode 2
description:
Horde Mode 2 is about fighting zombies as they spawn around in three spawn points. There is only one map. This is and always will be Free to play.

ANIMATIONS AND MODELS WILL COME LATER IN DEVELOPMENT. Mainly for the Zombies, the player, has his model done and rigged, it just has a few issues before It gets put in.

Gameplay:

  • One Map In Later Updates More Maps will come.
  • Many Weapons(Rifle, Shotgun, sniper, etc)!
  • Zombies! Lots and Lots of Zombies!
  • Controller Support!

Controls: W, A, S, and D to move. 

Left mouse button to fire. 

Right Mouse Button to Aim.

Escape to exit the game. 

Scroll wheel to change weapons.

Press E to pick up Weapons.

There are weapons directly in front of you upon spawn pick them up immediately, because zombies will be coming.

Much More!

Support this game by rating and leaving suggestions.

Have Fun!
